name: In re BABY GIRL P. Appeal of C. C. P.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
parties: In re BABY GIRL P. Appeal of C. C. P.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each party to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James J. Kirchner, Lancaster, J. Brooke Aker, James R. Beam, Norristown, Montgomery County, for appellant.
Jeffrey M. Mottern, Hummelstown, for Jeffrey M. Mot-tern.
Peter R. Andrews, Lillian M. Morgan, Donald L. Reihart, York, for adoptive parents.
casebody.head_matter:
411 A.2d 217
In re BABY GIRL P. Appeal of C. C. P.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 21, 1980.
Decided Feb. 25, 1980.
James J. Kirchner, Lancaster, J. Brooke Aker, James R. Beam, Norristown, Montgomery County, for appellant.
Jeffrey M. Mottern, Hummelstown, for Jeffrey M. Mot-tern.
Peter R. Andrews, Lillian M. Morgan, Donald L. Reihart, York, for adoptive parents.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN and FLAHERTY, JJ.
